    • Method Detail

      • loadConfiguration

        public static ExtendedConfiguration loadConfiguration(File file)
        Creates a new ExtendedConfiguration, loading from the given file.

        Any errors loading the Configuration will be logged and then ignored. If the specified input is not a valid config, a blank config will be returned.

        Parameters:
        file - Input file
        Returns:
        Resulting configuration
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown is file is null

      • setClassLoader

        public static void setClassLoader(ClassLoader loader)

      • buildHeader

        protected String buildHeader()
        Description copied from class: ExFileConfiguration
        Compiles the header for this ExFileConfiguration and returns the result.

        This will use the header from ExFileConfiguration.options() -> ExFileConfigurationOptions.header(), respecting the rules of ExFileConfigurationOptions.copyHeader() if set.

        Specified by:
        buildHeader in class ExFileConfiguration
        Returns:
        Compiled header

      • convertMapsToSections

      • loadFromString

        public void loadFromString(String contents)
                    throws org.bukkit.configuration.InvalidConfigurationException
        Description copied from class: ExFileConfiguration
        Loads this ExFileConfiguration from the specified string, as opposed to from file.

        All the values contained within this configuration will be removed, leaving only settings and defaults, and the new values will be loaded from the given string.

        If the string is invalid in any way, an exception will be thrown.

        Specified by:
        loadFromString in class ExFileConfiguration
        Parameters:
        contents - Contents of a Configuration to load.
        Throws:
        org.bukkit.configuration.InvalidConfigurationException - Thrown if the specified string is invalid.

        public void save()
